snippet: The sophisticated underground passageway featured electricity, ventilation and an electronic rail system and took about a year to build, officials said.
abstract: Federal officials say deep tunnel snaking nearly 600 yards from Mexico under border and into San Diego warehouse is shut down; more than eight tons of marijuana and 325 pounds of cocaine is confiscated and three people are taken into custody; tunnel featured electricity, ventilation and an electronic rail system and took about a year to build.

byline.original: By LIAM DILLON and IAN LOVETT
byline.contributor: Liam Dillon reported from San Diego, and Ian Lovett from Los Angeles.

lead_paragraph: The sophisticated underground passageway featured electricity, ventilation and an electronic rail system and took about a year to build, officials said.

headline.main: Tunnel for Smuggling Found Under U.S.-Mexico Border; Tons of Drugs Seized
headline.print_headline: Tunnel for Smuggling Found Under Border; Tons of Drugs Seized
